name: spcdv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: spcimdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: spcimdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

comment: Rule of specialization, using implicit substitution. Analogous to ~ rspcdv . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
